articles.author: Rupsa Chakraborty
articles.title: As state records highest ever Zika outbreak, Mumbai’s surveillance and testing draw criticism - The Indian Express
articles.description: A senior health officer from Maharashtra expressed concerns that with Pune's significant number of cases and Mumbai's large floating population, it is improbable that the virus is absent from the city.
articles.content: Maharashtra has reported 28 Zika cases this year, the highest number of cases since the first case was reported in 2021. While Pune district accounts for 24 of the total cases reported so far, Mumbai… [+2572 chars]
